> [citadell](#comment_12_1GE4QKLQM3L6r1NngDQEuEzwNBqHoBiXtL): Why is ipv6 important?

IPv6 ~3,4 x 10^38

Nearly everything can have a unique IP. If that's a good thing...who knows. :-)
